SELECT auction.*, auctionrecord.id record_id, auctionrecord.auctionId record_auction_id, auctionrecord.userId record_user_id, auctionrecord.auctionPrice, auctionrecord.auctionTime, `user`.userId, `user`.userName from auction left JOIN auctionrecord ON auction.auctionId = auctionrecord.auctionId
left JOIN `user`
ON auctionrecord.userId = `user`.userId
WHERE auction.auctionId = #{auctionId}
order by auctionrecord.auctionPrice DESC
